vfarcic.github.io

Who Uses What?

Open Source Jenkins With FreeStyle Jobs

  • Do not know how to write code
  • Afraid to upgrade
  • Think that being up-to-date does not matter

Open Source Jenkins On VMs With Jenkinsfile Jobs

  • Those comfortable coding
  • Those who understand the importance of everything-as-code and Git is the only source of truth concepts
  • Small organizations, or monster Jenkins
  • Those not yet ready to switch to containers

CloudBees Core V2 Traditional

  • The need to scale
  • Teams that share Jenkins
  • Not yet ready to switch to containers
  • Typically big organizations

CloudBees Core V2 Modern

  • The need to scale
  • Fault tolerant
  • Each team gets a Jenkins
  • Typically big and mid-size organizations
  • Adopted Kubernetes as the platform to run CD
  • Not yet ready to fully embrace Kubernetes

Jenkins X Static

  • Teams that believe in open source
  • Teams that fully embraced Kubernetes
  • Companies that want a simpler transition
  • Mostly smaller and medium-sized companies

Jenkins X Serverless

  • Teams that like being on the cutting edge
  • Teams that understand the importance of scaling, fault tolerance, or other cloud native concepts
  • Mostly smaller companies, with medium-sized planning to adopt soon

CloudBeess Core V3

  • Teams that fully embraced Kubernetes
  • Companies that need enterprise-grade software
  • Teams that need much more than CD
This site is open source. Improve this page.
